Title: Alternate Lifestyles
Plot: An economics class project pairs Dawson and Jen as a husband and wife and Pacey and Andie as a married couple. Jen tries to use this project to get closer to Dawson and Pacey gets to know more about Andie's background. Joey learns that she has a chance of success while doing this project.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Coarse language and sexual references
GuestStars: Leann Hunley, Tamara Taylor, Chris Blackwelder, Colin Fickes, Jonathan Taylor Luthren, Jeff Pillars, Nancy Saunders
